description: Defines the Note entity class for persistence in a database, including fields, constructors, lifecycle callbacks, and getters/setters.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Entity representing a note with fields such as id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, along with lifecycle callbacks for creation and updates.

methods.name: Note()
methods.description: Default constructor for the Note class.

methods.name: Note(String title, String content)
methods.description: Constructor to create a new Note instance with specified title and content.

methods.name: onCreate()
methods.description: Lifecycle callback invoked before persisting, sets createdAt and updatedAt to current timestamp.

methods.name: onUpdate()
methods.description: Lifecycle callback invoked before updating, updates the updatedAt timestamp.

methods.name: getId()
methods.description: Returns the id of the note.

methods.name: setId(Long id)
methods.description: Sets the id of the note.

methods.name: getTitle()
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle(String title)
methods.description: Sets the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent()
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent(String content)
methods.description: Sets the content of the note.
